title: ISFCR summer internship
content: I got selected for the ISFCR summer internship. Is it really worth staying for two months for this internship instead of going home? Will it help with placements?

comments.body:
the 'worth it' part really depends on your mentor and how well they guide you (which is not very commor T-T)  
some people end up publishing a paper from it , might help you with your masters, but coming to placements, if you're going to put it on your resume , there obviously will be questions about it , so depends on how well you can explain your work.
I'm in a similar situation. I can take up ISFCR or do anything industry internship through referral. Which one is better for a 4th sem guy?
If masters, research projects better, if placements industry internships better.. Simple
